underlying_goal: To reformat an existing LaTeX research paper from ICML style to ICLR style for a workshop submission, preserving all content and figures.
friction_detail: Claude failed to follow the most critical instruction: to copy the full 1494-line main.tex. Instead, it edited an existing 190-line stub file, resulting in a completely incorrect, short paper. The user had to intervene multiple times to correct this fundamental error.
brief_summary: The user provided a detailed plan to reformat a LaTeX paper for a new conference. Claude failed to follow the core instruction of copying the full source file, instead editing a small, existing stub. This resulted in an incorrect output, user frustration, and the session ending with the task unaccomplished.
